messages.content:
webapp which asks you to create a new password but always errors about something, from not having an uppercase, not having a number, not having a symbol, not having an emoji, not having a chinese char and an english char, not using any of the "shader" ascii chars, and finally the impossible-to-beat, not using a null byte
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
